official_title: A Prospective Pilot Study to Evaluate the Feasibility of Intensity Modulated Proton Therapy in Reducing Toxicity in Anal Cancer
inclusion_criteria:
* Karnofsky Performance Status >70%
* Histologically documented squamous or basaloid carcinoma of the anal canal
* Stage T2-4 disease with any N category
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria: â€¢ Patients with a life expectancy of < 3 months.
